page.title: 11INDUSTRY
page.content: {HODGSON'S TIMBER CONSTRUCTION COMPANY {(COTHERSTONE)} Established 1906 by William Hodgson and still run by same family, now 4th generation - owner Mr Dennis Hodgson.{Produce} Garden Sheds, Poultry houses, Summer houses, Stables Field shelter, Club Houses, Dog kennels; all made from softwood impor- ted from Canada and Sweden & weather- proofed; 2 machines automatically assemble buildings. Wood shaving re- cyled into brickettes for heating; employs 8 men in works, 3 Delivery Wagons and 3 Drivers{SHIPLEY QUARRY {Opened in early 1800s}by Egglestone Estates. Bought in 1921 by Mr T Cross whose grandson TH Cross runs it today. Stone quarried - Hard York Sandstone sent North as far as Edinburgh & Glasgow & south as far as Bournemouth. Employs 3-6 men and 14 extra on demand Many local houses built of this stone.
